name: Grunt Task Runner
description: This task runs the Sitecore Package Deployer on your Sitecore instance, then reports on it's progress
author: Christopher Pateman

inputs.name: SitecoreUrl
inputs.label: Sitecore URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is your Sitecore instance base url e.g. https://www.mywebsite.com

inputs.name: Force
inputs.label: Force Package Deployer Process
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will force the Sitecore Package Deployer to run even if it is busy.

inputs.name: CheckPackageComplete
inputs.label: Check Package Deployer Progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will monitor the Sitecore Package Deployer Folder for it progress in processing the update packages.

inputs.name: SitecorePackageDeployerPath
inputs.label: Sitecore Package Deployer Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Verbose mode. A lot more information output.
